ygData.subject: Decisions, decisions..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Destructor. The ark is gone? The maximal base is totally gone?  She looked at her hands and then looked up at Destructor.  But we are

::KitKat::
She looked at Destructor. "The ark is gone? The maximal base is 
totally gone?"  She looked at her hands and then looked up at 
Destructor.  "But we are still here? Is it possable that if the ark 
if rebuild, that will save history? Or is it possable that the ark 
isn't as important as we originally thought."  She thought about the 
deal. Perhaps this might work out yet.  She talks to Aracnia, 
starting the Predacon counsil here on earth. Now that the maximals 
are without a base, they are vulnerable. But, the alience is a 
problem. Or are they. They had helped her in the past. Then a strange 
idea came across her mind.  If she helped the maximals, and still 
kept her stings with Aracnia and add the allience to the council,  
then she could very easily have the maximals pay back the fave and 
use the council ties to get rid of Megatron.  Then, once that is 
done, she would use the council to get rid of the maximals and have 
the ark under predacon rule.  Safe and sound, but no maximals.  She 
smiled and looked at Destructor.  "Right now, I am not worried about 
the allience.  What worries me is Megatron. But if the ark is needed 
to keep our history going, then....." she looked down. She really 
didn't want to give this order, it went against every predacon 
program she had in her body. "You may take DarkMouse, your troops to 
help out.  You may take whom you need for this mission. But we must 
have enough bots here to defend the base.  Autoguns aren't always 
reliable."  She walked up to Destructor and whispered into his ear," 
You had better be right about this. I'm going on your word on this. I 
don't beleive in helping the maximals. but if you feel this strongly 
about it, I shall go along with it. But if you put your troops in 
danger needlessly, put this base or anyone on it's crew in danger, 
you will answer to me.  I will not risk my troops.  Not on a whim. 
I...I have to much respect for my crew...and you, to lose you all on 
some maximals who can't defend thier own base. But we won't do this 
for nothing.  If we help, then they will help us to seek out and 
destroy Megarton.  If we are to help, then they will follow that part 
of the bargin."  she put her hand on his shoulder and looked at his 
face, looking for a responce and understanding.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   "I have been contacted by my allies. The ark has been destroyed. 
We have 
> not been destroyed but i dont know how. All I know is it must be 
rebuilt. My 
> destron friend Sphink has already contacted you. His destron forces 
have 
> already agreeded to help the maximals rebuild the ark. I fwe do so 
we will 
> save history and help us win over the maximals favor. I know you do 
not like 
> the maximals but if we are to take down the alliance we will need 
the 
> maximals. Now we will also need the help of your troops to rebuild 
the ark. 
> My spy..is Ultra Magnus. The former comander of the autobots. And 
he is ready 
> to go under your command."
